Static Methods Details

public apply(xml : Xml) : Void

Applies the given style or layout from the provided Xml node

public getLayoutName(xml : Xml) : String

returns
Null or layout name
Gets the name from a layout xml node.

public getStyleName(xml : Xml) : String

parameters
xml Xml to parse
returns
Null or style name
Gets the name from a style xml node.

public isDataNode(xml : Xml) : Bool

parameters
xml Xml to parse
returns
true when parsing a data node

parameters
xml Xml to parse
returns
true when parsing a data source node

parameters
xml Xml to parse
returns
true when parsing a layout node

xml Xml to parse
returns
true when parsing a style node

Instance Methods Details

private parseNode(node : Xml, ?parent : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
node The xml parse
parent Parent to attach instance to (needed for component constructors)
returns
Parse an xml node, creating a proper class instance, calling init() if needed.

private parseScriptNode(className : String, node : Xml, inst : haxegui.controls.Component, resolvedClass : Class<Dynamic>) : Void

parameters
className Name of the class
node Xml to parse
inst The instance to attach the script to
resolvedClass The class to attach the script to
returns
throws
String Error
parseScriptNode

Scripts must go in a CData tag
